I think it is good to get such info (I am currently looking into repetetive
code). However using bug reports for such items are, in my view, not the right
way to report such reports. (e.g. what would be the point where the bug report
could be closed).

I'm sorry about this one, originally I intended to post the report here, but
it's too large for bugzilla.  I'm happy if someone closes this off now, as you
rightly say, there's no way to close the "bug".  But I didn't want to send a
large attachment to everyone on the mailing list, I thought this would be a good
compromise, it wasn't.
